COMMON.description: Ohranite občutljive informacije izven el. pošte in klepetalnice. Posredujte povezavo za enkratni vpogled.
COMMON.secret_passphrase_hint: Beseda ali fraza, ki jo je težko uganiti
COMMON.burn_this_secret_hint: Brisanje bo izvedeno pred branjem  (potrdi tukaj)
COMMON.secret_was_truncated: Sporočilo je okrnjeno, ker je končano

homepage.tagline2: Ohranite občutljive informacije izven el. pošte in klepetalnice.
homepage.secret_hint: * Povezava je enkratna po uporabi izgine za vedno.
homepage.cta_subtitle: Dvignite svojo blagovno znamko in delite z zaupanjem

private.this_msg_is_encrypted: To sporočilo je šifrirano z vašim geslom.

shared.viewed_own_secret: Odprli ste lastno skrivno sporočilo, ki več ni na voljo za vpogled drugim.
shared.you_created_this_secret: Sami ste avtor tega sporočila. Če ga odprete, naslovniku več ne bo dostopno.

incoming.tagline1: Paste a password, secret message or private link below.
incoming.tagline2: Keep sensitive info out of your email and chat logs.
incoming.secret_hint: * A secret link only works once and then disappears forever.
incoming.incoming_secret_placeholder: Enter any information your support representative will need (e.g. system password)
incoming.incoming_ticket_number_hint: You can find this in your email (e.g. 123456)

incomingsupport.subject: [Ticket: %s]
incomingsupport.body1: A customer has sent the following info

secretlink.subject: %s sent you a secret
secretlink.body1: We have a secret for you from
secretlink.body_tagline: If you don't know the sender or believe it to be spam, send us the details here:

welcome.subject: Verify your Onetime Secret account
welcome.body1: Welcome to Onetime Secret. We have a secret for you!
welcome.postscript2: If you didn't create this account, delete this message and we won't contact you again.
